.. currentmodule:: grig.toolkit

************************
Toolkit (`grig.toolkit`)
************************

Introduction
============

The :mod:`grig.toolkit` module contains a few utilities used by the main
resampling module.

Miscellaneous Functions (:mod:`func`)
=====================================
The :mod:`grig.toolkit.func` module contains various functions that are
used by multiple other functions in :mod:`grig` but are not easily classified
into one of the larger modules.
